Spooky Tombstone:
You see mysterious symbols and intricate patterns carved on the headstone. It seems like they can put on magic power. Between characters cut 5 deep cells, each of which looks wide enough to be able to insert a small disk. Interestingly, each cell is lined with its metal: tin, lead, iron, copper and white gold.
(In order to move forward, You need to gather a group, the members of which are all 5 medals Tully, and each member of this group should be a medal from the excellent from the rest of the medals.)
